import React from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import './App.css' import humidity from './humidity.png' import pressure from './resilient.png' import high from './high-temperature.png' import low from './low-temperature.png' import wind from './wind.png' import travel from './immigrant.png' import eventplanner from './calendar.png' import farmer from './farmer.png' import Popup from './Popup' import './Modal.css' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { useState } from 'react' import Cards from './Cards' import Farmer from './Farmer' import Farmers from './Farmers' const key="a74e21e2e11290ddc996d96f101cb1c8"; const Home = () => { const [city,setCity]=useState(''); const [data,setData]=useState(); const [error, setError] = useState(""); const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(false); const [bfarm, setBfarm] = useState(false); const [gOpen, setGopen] = useState(false); const [bOpen, setBopen] = useState(false); const [gTrav, setGtrav] = useState(false); const [bTrav, setBtrav] = useState(false); const gFarm = () => { setIsOpen(!isOpen); } const badFarm=()=>{ setBfarm(!bfarm); } const gPlan = () => { setGopen(!gOpen); } const bPlan=()=>{ setBopen(!bOpen); } const gTravel = () => { setGtrav(!gTrav); } const bTravel=()=>{ setBtrav(!bTrav); } const fetchData=async()=>{ try{ const response=await axios.get(`https://api.openweathermap.org/data/2.5/weather?q=${city}&appid=${key}`); setData(response.data); setError(""); console.log(response.data); } catch(err){ if(city==""){ setError("Please enter city name "); } else{ setError("please enter the city name correctly"); } console.error("Error fetching weather data:", err); } } return (
setCity(e.target.value)} placeholder='enter the city name' />

{error}

{data ? (

Lon - {data.coord.lon}
):(
)}

{isOpen &&

Warm Season Crops


  • Tomatoes, Peppers, Eggplant, Cucumbers, Squash, Corn.
  • These crops thrive in warmer temperatures ranging from 20°C to 35°C.
  • They are usually planted in late spring or early summer after the danger of frost has passed.
} handleClos={gFarm} />} {bfarm &&

Cool Season Crops


  • Lettuce, Spinach, Kale, Peas, Broccoli, Cauliflower.
  • These crops prefer cooler temperatures ranging from 7°C to 19°C.
  • They are usually planted in late spring or early summer after the danger of frost has passed.
} handleClos={badFarm} />} {gOpen &&

Great Time for events


  • Swimming
  • Weddings
  • Birthday Parties
  • Marathons
  • Sports Activities
  • Team Building Activities
  • Event planning involves careful consideration of the goals, audience, logistics, budget, and overall experience desired for each unique event.
} handleCloses={gPlan} />} {bOpen &&

Great Time for events


  • Trekking
  • Fishing
  • Sunrise and Sunset
  • Boating
  • Event planning involves careful consideration of the goals, audience, logistics, budget, and overall experience desired for each unique event.
} handleCloses={bPlan} />} {gTrav &&

Great Time for Travel


  • beach vacations
  • water activities like theme park, water park
  • historical sites
  • vibrant markets
} handleClose={gTravel} />} {bTrav &&

Great Time for Travel


  • Mountainous Regions
  • wildLife park
  • Visit Lakes
  • Bike ride for Long Road
} handleClose={bTravel} />}
) } export default Home
